t: Amazon.com: Higher! (8LP/1 CD Box Set) (Amazon Exclusive): CDs & Vinyl
s: This incredible collection showcases ... stereo format, but in the good ol' mono mixes which went missing long ago with the transistor radio, and in unheard early versions, and concert performances. Also included are gems from Sly Stewarts' pre-Family Stone period, studio outtakes, and potent instrumentals from this archetype of jam bands. With 17 previously unreleased tracks, it's a lot more music than you knew was there all remastered to hit the pinnacle of sound on 180-gram audiophileÂ ...

s: A trip in the way back machine for me to July1970 here in Newport (Jazz or Folk festival, I can't recall). When Sly and his Family Stone came out to the jaded Newport crowd in silks, satins, and colorful feathers and yelled "Stand" we did and we couldn't sit back down.
